def_cn: （用于名词词组前，指代已提及的人或事物）这些
def_en: You use these at the beginning of noun groups to refer to someone or something that you have already mentioned or identified.

def_cn: (引出将要提及的人或事物)这些
def_en: You use these to introduce people or things that you are going to talk about.

def_cn: (口语中用来引出故事中的人或物)一些
def_en: In spoken English, people use these to introduce people or things into a story.

def_cn: 这些，他们(用以说明或询问身份)
def_en: You use these when you are identifying someone or asking about their identity.

def_cn: 这些(指离自己近的人或物，尤指所触碰或指向的人或物)
def_en: You use these to refer to people or things that are near you, especially when you touch them or point to them.

def_cn: 这些(用于指代认为谈话对象了解具体所指的事物，或确认双方所想的是相同的人或物)
def_en: You use these when you refer to something which you expect the person you are talking to to know about, or when you are checking that you are both thinking of the same person or thing.
You use these in the expression these days to mean 'at the present time'.
